paper.title: Deterministic systems of sequential processes: theory and tools

author.org: Pierre et Marie Curie Univ., Paris, France#TAB#

paper.abstract: In this paper, we present an analysis of an interesting class of Petri nets : Deterministic systems of sequential processes. We give an extension of this class and new theoretical results. We show how these theorems have been implemented by rules in an expert system for Petri nets analysis.
